POST /dids/attachments¶

Add data identifiers to data identifiers.

Example request:

POST /dids/attachments HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Accept: application/json

Example response:

HTTP/1.1 201 Created
Vary: Accept
Status Codes:
  • 201 Created – Created
